entries.name: Chainmail
entries.description: A type of armour consisting of small metal rings linked together in a pattern to form a mesh.

entries.name: Leather Armor
entries.description: Rough leather armor hardened and shaped in to armor.

entries.name: Ostentatious Clothes
entries.description: You're really making a statement with these.

entries.name: Plate
entries.description: Personal body armor made of metal plates.

entries.name: Shield
entries.description: A piece of personal armour held in the hand, which may or may not be strapped to the wrist or forearm.
